alert.note: Alert for Upper Jefferson; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 12:14PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Orleans and northern Jefferson Parishes through 1245 PM CDT... At 1214 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jefferson, or near Metairie, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Metairie, Jefferson and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 230 and 247. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
